description:
SALE!!!! $0.99 FOR A LIMITED TIME!!
******
Ready for WebOS 2.0!  So you know the business you're looking for, you just don't know the phone number. Call 411 and pay $1.50? Not a chance. Use a mapping application? Too slow! You need their number, now. Try iHate411 for the quickest way to get around calling 411. Dial straight from iHate411, and if you need the map... we've got you covered. Now you can save your favorites to a list, it's like having your own address books of places you frequently call! (Like the pizza place you always order from)

****** NOTE ******
iHate411 is for business lookups and does NOT provide personal listings!
****** SUPPORT ******
If you have an issue or question, please email ihate411@ncavesoft.com rather than using the App Catalog.  Or better yet, visit www.ncavesoft.com to get updates on iHate411 news and see our other WebOS software.
